DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to identify neural correlates involved in arthmetics processing in adults and children aged 8 to 14 with normal cognitive function. Brain area will be identified by functional magnetic resonance imaging (IRMf).
DOC.criteria: children aged 8 to 14 with parents' consent adults aged 18 to 24 righthanded affiliated to the French social security known neurological disorders including epilepsia known psychiatric disorders including Attention Deficit Disorder birth complications needing intensive care central nervous system treatment important hearing disabilities not corrected impaired vision
